sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"骄傲的，傲慢的"之意。
means: haughty ： 较正式用词，多用于贬义。指对身份或地位比自己低的人采取冷淡、轻视或鄙互的态度。
proud ： 含义广，普通用词。褒义指自豪和荣耀以及强烈的自尊；贬义则指傲慢，自以为是或自鸣得意。
arrogant ： 用于贬义，指过高估计自己，以致骄傲自大或傲慢无礼，目中无人。
vain ： 指一个对自己的外表或对自己留给别的印象太过分地关注，以致自命不凡，自鸣得意。

sentence.Network_en: He gave me a haughty look and walked away.
sentence.Network_cn: 他向我摆出傲慢的表情后走开.

sentence.Network_en: They were displeased with her haughty airs.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们讨厌她高傲的派头.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 兀字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 〖proud〗 倔强不随俗 〖haughty〗 高傲 〖this〗 这;这个.
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... high（ 高的）； haughty（ 傲慢的，高傲的）； arch（ 拱，拱形结构）；.
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... harmony 和谐 haughty 高傲的 heinous 憎恨的.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(四)|联想记忆法背单词 ... hasty adj. 匆忙的 haughty adj. 傲慢的，轻蔑的 haul v. 拖曳；拖运.

list.abs: They were displeased with her haughty airs ., 他们讨厌她高傲的派头.
An affected , often haughty pose ; affectation ., 装腔作势做作的且常是傲慢的姿态;
her haughty manners were meant to deceive us into thinking she was an aristocrat .她那趾高气扬的行为是故意要欺骗我们使我们认为她是一个贵族。
Yet he was not a haughty aristocrat ., 但他并非一个高傲的贵族.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: extended form of obsolete haught, earlier haut, from Old French, from Latin altus 'high'

entry.tran: 高傲自大的;倨傲无礼的;目中无人的
entry.def: You use haughty to describe someone's behaviour or appearance when you disapprove of the fact that they seem to be very proud and to think that they are better than other people.

example.ex: He spoke in a haughty tone.

means.word_mean: 1. having or showing arrogant superiority to and disdain of those one views as unworthy;

sentences.sentence: "some economists are disdainful of their colleagues in other social disciplines"
"his mother eyed my clothes with a supercilious air"
"a more swaggering mood than usual"- W.L.Shirer

auth_sentence.content: They were haughty and did detestable things before me.
